name: Devastation Annihilate the Alien Race
description:
Devastation - Annihilate the Alien Race, is a 2D Shoot em' up bullet chaos type game.
Rip through alien ships with nukes and power ups and wipe out everything in your path. Show them what one single ship can do, build your score competitively and team up  locally up to 4 players.
3 Different score competitive modes - Normal, Hardcore, Survival
4 different game types - Normal, 1 Life Mode, No Bombs, Max Weapons
PC - (With controller only)
Mobile - (in Development)
